summary: THE CONSUMER (WHICH IS THE MOTHER OF THE PERSON WHO SENT THIS CORRESPONDENCE)-HAD COME TO A CURVE WHERE SHE MISJUDGED THE TURN, AND CAUSED HER TO SLIDE OFF OF THE RIGHT SIDE OF THE ROAD AND HIT A PINE TREE.  THE IMPACT IGNITED A FIRE UNDER THE HOOD.  THE DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG DID NOT DEPLOY.   *MR   *SCC   *NLM
